<h3 id="X10916">X(10916)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-GARCIA AND OUTER-YFF TANGENTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3-(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*(b+c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10916) = (3*R+r)*X(1)-3*(R+r)*X(2) = (R-2*r)*X(11)-R*X(72)</b>
<p>X(10916) lies on these lines:{1,2}, {5,518}, {11,72}, {12,3555}, {40,6899}, {46,3434}, {56,3419}, {63,90}, {80,5288}, {104,3651}, {142,3841}, {191,4857}, {210,4187}, {225,596}, {226,3874}, {329,10591}, {354,442}, {355,10680}, {377,3338}, {404,5178}, {496,960}, {515,6985}, {516,1158}, {517,3813}, {528,3579}, {631,3189}, {758,946}, {908,5904}, {942,2886}, {950,993}, {956,1837}, {958,5722}, {999,5794}, {1001,5791}, {1068,1861}, {1145,3893}, {1512,5881}, {1519,5693}, {1770,3218}, {1788,5082}, {2321,8609}, {2476,3873}, {2801,6260}, {2802,10265}, {2900,6889}, {2975,10572}, {2994,7042}, {3436,10826}, {3452,3678}, {3475,6856}, {3583,6763}, {3670,3914}, {3681,4193}, {3742,8728}, {3816,5044}, {3817,6990}, {3820,4662}, {3822,3881}, {3829,9955}, {3838,6147}, {3880,5690}, {3884,5837}, {3916,6284}, {3925,5439}, {3927,9669}, {4293,5175}, {4294,5744}, {4301,6845}, {4302,4652}, {4304,5267}, {4430,5141}, {4661,5154}, {4863,5687}, {5087,10593}, {5248,5745}, {5433,5440}, {5587,6762}, {5657,10806}, {5707,5847}, {5708,5880}, {5715,5811}, {5728,6067}, {5775,9785}, {5777,7681}, {5818,10597}, {5853,6684}, {6585,6796}, {6601,6865}, {6849,7682}, {6925,10085}, {8193,10835}, {9857,10879}, {10164,10902}, {10791,10804}</p>
<p>
X(10916) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (8715,6684), (10915,10)<br>
X(10916) = complement of X(3811)<br>X(10916) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,5705,10198), (1,6734,10), (8,1737,10), (8,3086,997), (8,10529,1), (10,3625,6736), (10,9843,3634), (997,3086,1125), (1210,4847,10), (3678,3825,3452), (5705,10198,3634), (5904,7741,908)<br></p>
